wordpressPage.title: Perspectives
wordpressPage.content:
(This discussion starter was designed by Beth Cooper)

You’ll need this internet meme

1 – Show the group the image

2 – Say ‘Sometimes you just need to see things from a different perspective’

3 – Discuss the above statement? What do the group think?

4 – What situations do the group find difficult to see differently?

5 – Has anyone ever offered them a different perspective on a situation in their life?

Bible Input – 1 Corinthians 13:12 (use The Message version)

6 – What does this verse have to say about perspectives?

7 – How does God see our tricky situations?
